sentences: Amalie Malling (born 1948, LÃ¼beck) is a Danish classical pianist.
She studied under Herman David Koppel and then at the Hanover conservatoire and regularly worked with Alfred Brendel.
1991 Heise chamber music (with Morten Zeuthen, etc.)
